summary:
### 📌 Disease:
📌  Durian Leaf Blight

### 💥 Cause:
- 💥  Caused by several fungi such as Alternaria alternata and Colletotrichum gloeosporioides. Spreads through infected plant debris or contaminated tools.


### 😷 Symptoms:
- 😷  Brown blotches on leaf surfaces, expanding and turning necrotic with yellow halos, and eventually causing leaf drop.


### 💊 Treatment & Prevention:
- 💊  Apply fungicides, maintain good sanitation (clean tools and remove infected plant debris), and ensure proper air circulation around trees. Regularly spray trees with copper or bordeaux mixture to prevent infection.
